SYN_3_3_2943:
Billing: 32561 (Fibrinolysis, initial day). 76604-26 (US Chest, limited). 
Justification: Ultrasound performed to assess degree of loculation prior to drug administration. 10mg tPA and 5mg DNase instilled to break up septations described in US findings (thick loculations, isoechoic/hyperechoic).
